title: Initialise the repo
goal: Get a working repo with all scripts set up for development

steps.title: Install create-react-app
steps.details: Run 'yarn global add create-react-app' from your console

steps.title: Initialise the repo
steps.details: Go to directory and run 'create-react-app todoapp --scripts-version=react-scripts-ts' to initialise the repo in todoapp folder

title: Simple koa backend
goal: Introduce a simple mock backend that will emulate the work of a real backend

steps.title: Add necessary libraries
steps.details: Add koa, koa-router and nodemon to the project

steps.title: Create 'server' directory
steps.details: Server directory will contain all server-side code. Server.js contains the server launch script.

steps.title: Add cors capabilities to backend
steps.details: Add koa-cors library and apply it in the backend

steps.title: Wrap fetch
steps.details: Wrap fetch api with request method that will do the proper set up for fetch calls

steps.title: Add ApiService
steps.details: ApiService should expose specific methods to retrieve data, hiding the details of the calls

steps.title: Make a test call
steps.details: Call the backend from the App component, updating it's state when the promise is resolved

title: Redux store and Routing
goal: Introduce redux store to properly manage data in the app

steps.title: Add necessary redux libraries with devtools support
steps.details: Add redux, react-redux, redux-thunk, and redux-devtools-extension

steps.title: Add necessary routing libraries
steps.details: Add react-router and react-router-redux

steps.title: Create rootReducer
steps.details: Use combine reducers to initialize rootReducer, make it aware of routing

steps.title: Initialise the store
steps.details: Write a function that will initialise redux middlewares, store enhancers and create the actual store

title: Put some data on the store and display it in a connected component
goal: The App component will no longer require private state if data is moved to the store

steps.title: Model todos state
steps.details: Todos state will need to handle loading indicator and the actual data. Show this in your types.

steps.title: Create todos actions enum and todos reducer
steps.details: Using combineReducers the update of each individual field on the state can be simplified

steps.title: Write the loadTodos function
steps.details: The loadTodos action will handle the async call to the backend and dispatch multiple actions

steps.title: Create TodosContainer - connected component
steps.details: TodosContainer should actually execute call to the server in componentDidMount() and display the retrieved data.

title: Introduce redux sagas
goal: Introduce a framework for effects management

steps.title: Add necessary library
steps.details: Run 'yarn add redux-saga' in the command line

steps.title: Enhance the store with saga middleware
steps.details: Redux-saga library provides createSagaMiddleware method.

steps.title: Introduce the root saga
steps.details: Introduce the single point of entry for all sagas. Don't forget to call sagaMiddleware.run(rootSaga).

steps.title: Implement todosSaga saga and attach it to rootSaga
steps.details: This saga will dispatch several actions while handling the call to the backed to retrieve todos

title: Introduce styled-components
goal: Apply styling to the components with JS

steps.title: Add necessary libraries
steps.details: Run 'yarn add styled-components' and 'yarn add normalize.css' in the command line

steps.title: Rewrite existing components
steps.details: Migrate PageLayout that uses CSS to the new approach.

steps.title: Introduce jest-styled-components
steps.details: Run 'yarn add jest-styled-components -D' in command line. This will add toHaveStyleRule assertion that will be useful in styled components styling.

steps.title: Introduce LoadingIndicator component and use it in TodosContainer
steps.details: Loading indicator will cover the area of the screen with opacity to give the user feedback on what's going on in the app.

steps.title: Introduce colors constants and utils for styling
steps.details: Introduce an enum with named colors, introduce rem() function what will convert px to rems. Extract common styling components like H1 to Styled allowing easy extension.

title: Add styling
goal: Display Todo List in a neat way

steps.title: Add TodosList component
steps.details: This component will render a list of TodoCard Components

steps.title: Add TodoCard component
steps.details: This is a building block for TodosList
